author: Staff Reporter
text:
College students would be roped in as ambassadors for creating awareness on voting for the Assembly elections in the district.

District Election Officer Sajjansingh R. Chavan convened a meeting of college ambassadors here on Thursday.

Necessary training would be given to the students who would like to volunteer as ambassadors by the election department in all districts in the State.

Volunteers should create awareness on voting among young voters, thus increasing the voting percentage than in the previous elections.

The officials hoped that this would help improve the polling percentage, as many young voters would exercise their franchise.

Through social media

The ambassadors would be linked among themselves and with the officials through social media.

A dedicated Whatsapp group called College Ambassadors Group (CAGs) would also be created.

Information relating to Systematic Voters Education and Electoral Participation (SVEEP) programme and election related information can be exchanged between the group members as well as the officials of the election department, an official said.
title: College students turn ambassadors
